title: How to Get Mithril on Survival Beginnings (ROBLOX)

steps.headline: Forage four stones.
steps.description: These can be found at the gray ore islands. Then get a haft. To get that, forage a tree trunk.

steps.headline: Mine three Tin ore, and three Copper ore.
Smelt the ores.
steps.description: Use your flint to set something on fire, and put your ores next to it. Wait.

steps.headline: Once they are smelted, put them in your inventory.
steps.description: Go to craft, and choose the "Bronze" option. There should be three.

steps.headline: With another haft, go to tools and make the Bronze Pickaxe.
Get Iron.
steps.description: You also need coal. Get four of both.

steps.headline: Smelt the Iron, not the coal.
Go to craft and choose four Steel.
Get the Mithril.
steps.description: Try going to The Arch or the Mainland. In this tutorial, you'll go to The Arch.

steps.headline: Go to Desert Island, and forage lots of cacti.
Go to the arch.
steps.description: Place the cacti on the stone and it will stick. You can climb it up and get the Mithril, using the Stone Pickaxe. Be careful not to fall off the arch. Keep an open eye for others there who may try to kill you.

text: Forage four stones. These can be found at the gray ore islands. Then get a haft. To get that, forage a tree trunk. Craft a Stone Pickaxe.  Mine three Tin ore, and three Copper ore.  Smelt the ores. Use your flint to set something on fire, and put your ores next to it. Wait. Once they are smelted, put them in your inventory. Go to craft, and choose the "Bronze" option. There should be three. With another haft, go to tools and make the Bronze Pickaxe.  Get Iron. You also need coal. Get four of both. Smelt the Iron, not the coal.  Go to craft and choose four Steel.  Make a Steel Pickaxe. (You will nee another haft.) Get the Mithril. Try going to The Arch or the Mainland. In this tutorial, you'll go to The Arch. Go to Desert Island, and forage lots of cacti.  Go to the arch. Place the cacti on the stone and it will stick. You can climb it up and get the Mithril, using the Stone Pickaxe. Be careful not to fall off the arch. Keep an open eye for others there who may try to kill you.
